en: loud sound of a finger coming out of your mouth
The child sucked his finger, making a loud noise.

ngiemboon: N ne ńgɔɔn nò, á sóon lê tsẅǐd.
Mèŋ tè ne ńkwoŋe tsẅíʼte wɔ́.

en: sound of a ripe fruit falling to the ground

ngiemboon: Pîɛ fǒ gwě ssé lê tsyâg.
Tsyee ɔ̀ cʉ́a tá weg Ssé ka?

en: leftovers from squeezing something to extract something else
child conceived without respecting family planning
